text: Making Love is a 1982 American drama movie directed by Arthur Hiller and starring Michael Ontkean, Harry Hamlin, Kate Jackson, Wendy Hiller, Arthur Hill, Nancy Olson. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1982 drama movies Category:1982 LGBT movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies directed by Arthur Hiller Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Making Love
